import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpService } from 'src/app/services/http.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-customers', templateUrl: './add-customers.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-customers.component.css'] }) export class AddCustomersComponent { public isLoading = false; showToast constructor(private http: HttpService){} public formData = { name: "", age: "", postCode: "", gender: "", street: "", houseNumber: "", order_amount: "", } addCustomer(){ this.isLoading = true; this.http.post("/customers", this.formData, (data: any) => { if(data.success){ this.isLoading = false; this.showToast = true; } }); } } }
